bootstrap-light.php : 11

Bootstrap-Light

public mixed ROOT = "/var/www/default/htdocs/httpdocs/"

A stripped-down version of the bootstrap file for scripts that do not require the full site layout, such as API endpoints and background/CLI scripts.

reArrayFiles()

functions.php : 22

Reorganizes the $_FILES array structure to be more manageable.

reArrayFiles(array<string|int, mixed> &$file_post) : array<string|int, mixed>

This function takes the array structure created by PHP for file uploads (when multiple files are uploaded) and reorganizes it into a more manageable format.

Parameters
$file_post : array<string|int, mixed>

The original $_FILES array.

Return values
array<string|int, mixed> —

The reorganized array of files.
